ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He has let loose the two seas, converging together,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: He has set two seas in motion that flow side by side together,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: He unleashed the two seas so that they merge together,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: He has made the two oceans meet each other,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: He has set flowing two seas that appear to meet.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: He has Maraja the two seas meeting together.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: He has made the two seas to flow freely (so that) they meet together:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: He let forth the two seas that meet together,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: He hath loosed the two seas. They meet.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: He has set the two oceans in motion, converging together.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: He hath let loose the two seas.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: He merged the two seas, meeting each other.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: He has let free the two bodies of flowing water, meeting together:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: He has let loosed the two seas (the salt water and the sweet) meeting together.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: He has let forth the two seas, they meet together,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He merged the two seas, converging together.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: He released the two seas, meeting [side by side];
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [55:19] He has loosed the two waters, the sweet and the salty; [and so] they meet, in the perception of the eye.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: He hath loosed the two seas) the sweet and the salty. (They meet) without mixing.
